title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The response only includes the first criterion below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the actual inflation rate is less than the expected inflation rate.
The response states that the actual inflation rate is less than the expected inflation rate.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that lenders will be better off and/or does not explain that the real value of the loans that will be repaid will be higher than expected OR does not explain the relationship between the nominal and the real interest rates using the Fisher equation

The response states that lenders will be better off and explains that the real value of the loans that will be repaid will be higher than expected OR explains the relationship between the nominal and the real interest rates using the Fisher equation

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that natural rate of unemployment will not change in the long run
The response states that the natural rate of unemployment will not change in the long run.
